title: The remake option was a bad idea
body:
With the ability to dodge...  games rarely are made in the 1st place.

With the ability to surrender there is little point in playing the game...

With the ability to remake most games never are played even if they are made.

Your conclusion is flawed.

The way I see it...  Every game is a 1vs5 anyway my teamates are so bad.

The less players the better.  More exp for me if he's gone.  They are just gonna hog the cs and feed.

Why should I have to pay for the fact I have one AFKer and 3 more who are quitters? 

Quitters are worse than AFKers cause they make you THINK you might have a chance to win the game.
